segment.source: How to Grant Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Grant Access to an Application

segment.source: How to Grant Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Grant Access to an Application

segment.source: How to Grant Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Grant Access to an Application

segment.source: As the administrator, you can use the Application Virtualization Server Management Console to determine which users can access which applications.
segment.target: As the administrator, you can use the Application Virtualization Server Management Console to determine which users can access which applications.

segment.source: You can do this when you import the Sequencer Project (SPRJ) or Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file or at anytime using the application's Properties dialog box.
segment.target: You can do this when you import the Sequencer Project (SPRJ) or Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file or at anytime using the application's Properties dialog box.

segment.source: With both methods, use the Access Permissions options to add users.
segment.target: With both methods, use the Access Permissions options to add users.

segment.source: To grant access to an application
segment.target: To grant access to an application

segment.source: For an existing application, click the Applications node in the left pane.
segment.target: For an existing application, click the Applications node in the left pane.

segment.source: Right-click an application in the right pane, and choose Properties.
segment.target: Right-click an application in the right pane, and choose Properties.

segment.source: Select the Access Permissions tab.
segment.target: Select the Access Permissions tab.

segment.source: To add user groups, click Add.
segment.target: To add user groups, click Add.

segment.source: In the Add/Edit User Group dialog box, navigate to the user group.
segment.target: In the Add/Edit User Group dialog box, navigate to the user group.

segment.source: You can also enter the domain and group by typing the information in the respective fields.
segment.target: You can also enter the domain and group by typing the information in the respective fields.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: You can add other groups with the same pages.
segment.target: You can add other groups with the same pages.

segment.source: When the wizard reappears, click OK.
segment.target: When the wizard reappears, click OK.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You must set up your groups in Active Directory Domain Services before you attempt to grant access to applications.
segment.target: You must set up your groups in Active Directory Domain Services before you attempt to grant access to applications.
